name: nashville
content:

the capital and largest city of the southeastern US state of Tennessee and the centre of the country music industry: Nashville is a very friendly place. Neither of us had visited Nashville before.
More examplesFewer examplesThey dined in downtown Nashville.By 16, she had a songwriting deal in Nashville.
